QuestData.Title: Never Leave a Dinner Behind
QuestData.Description: Refugees are still pouring into Thundermar from the fighting, and I'm hungry! I mean them. The refugees, they're hungry.$B$BGet me some food from the Thundermar Ruins! Scour the ruins to the south, east, and southwest for any stores that still remain. Especially them big hocks of ham. I love those! Er, the refugees do.$B$BAnd see if you can find some of them little cocktail weenies.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 10 Wildhammer Food Stores from the Thundermar Ruins.
